results.title: Metformin and progestins in women with atypical hyperplasia or endometrial cancer: systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and progestins in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with atypical @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@hyperplasia@@@ or @DISEASE_Endometrial_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D016889 @@@endometrial cancer@@@: systematic review and meta-analysis.

results.title: Metformin limits osteoarthritis development and progression through activation of AMPK signalling
results.text_hl: Prominent @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@synovial hyperplasia@@@ and @DISEASE_Osteophyte @DISEASE_MESH:D054850 @@@osteophyte@@@ formation were observed at both 6 and 12 weeks after DMM surgery; these were significantly inhibited by treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ either before or after DMM surgery.

citations.NLM: Li J, Zhang B, Liu WX, Lu K, Pan H, Wang T, Oh CD, Yi D, Huang J, Zhao L, Ning G, Xing C, Xiao G, Liu-Bryan R, Feng S, Chen D. Metformin limits osteoarthritis development and progression through activation of AMPK signalling Ann Rheum Dis. 2020 May;79(5):635-645. PMID: 32156705

results.title: Pituitary Effects of Metformin in Men With Early-Onset Androgenic Alopecia.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment may protect @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with early-onset @DISEASE_Alopecia @DISEASE_MESH:D000505 @@@androgenic alopecia@@@ against the development of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@gonadotroph hyperplasia@@@ and/or focal @DISEASE_Testicular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D013733 @@@testicular@@@ changes.

results.title: 3D Elastomeric Stent Functionalized with Antioxidative and Perivascular Tissue Regenerative Activities Ameliorated PVT Deprivation-Induced Vein Graft Failure.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ induce rapid regeneration of perivascular adipose tissue in recipient regions, which improves patency by inhibiting @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@intimal hyperplasia@@@.

results.title: Maternal Metformin Intervention during Obese Glucose-Intolerant Pregnancy Affects Adiposity in Young Adult Mouse Offspring in a Sex-Specific Manner
results.text_hl: Instead, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ intervention increased @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@adipocyte hyperplasia@@@, macrophage infiltration and gonadal WAT @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ in male but not female offspring.

results.title: Metformin-induced alterations in gills of the freshwater fish Astyanax lacustris (Lutken, 1875) detected by histological and scanning electron microscopy.
results.text_hl: The main changes were lamellar fusion, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@telangiectasia hyperplasia@@@ and disappearance of microridges.

results.title: Metformin inhibits IL-1beta secretion via impairment of NLRP3 inflammasome in keratinocytes: implications for preventing the development of psoriasis
results.text_hl: Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment significantly decreased ear thickness, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@epidermal hyperplasia@@@ and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cell infiltration.

results.title: Reversing the reduced level of endometrial GLUT4 expression in polycystic ovary syndrome: a mechanistic study of metformin action.
results.text_hl: Moreover, we demonstrate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ induces @GENE_SLC2A4 @GENE_6517 @@@GLUT4@@@ expression and inhibits AR expression and blocks @GENE_INSR @GENE_3643 @@@insulin receptor@@@/PI3K/@GENE_AKT1 @GENE_207 @@@Akt@@@/@GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ signaling in the same @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@hyperplasia@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ tissues.
